Flow.description: Allows a Manager or Supervisor, to submit multiple Time Sheets for Approval at once.
Flow.interviewLabel: Screen Flow: Submit Multiple Time Sheets for Approval {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: Screen Flow: Submit Multiple Time Sheets for Approval

screens.name: Error_Screen_Approval_Subflow_Errored_Screen
screens.label: Error Screen - Approval Subflow Errored Screen

fields.name: displayErrorOccuredInSubflow
fields.fieldText:
Something went wrong...


The Approval Submission Process has failed.


It returned the following message:

{!inputErrorMessage}


Please contact your administrator.

fields.name: headerIntro
fields.fieldText:
Submit Time Sheets for Approval


Click below to get started

fields.name: headerSelectEmployees
fields.fieldText:
Manual Sending of Time Sheets


Select Employees to whom you want to manually send Time Sheets for Approval


If you select multiple employees, you will go through them one by one, in the coming windows.

fields.name: headerSkipSelection
fields.fieldText:
Multiple Employees Selected


You've selected to submit Time Sheets for approval for {!numSelectedEmployees} employees.


You can automatically select all unapproved Time Sheets or you can individually go through each Employee.


You will get an overview of all selected Time Sheets before making the final submission, regardless of your choice here.

fields.name: headerSelectTimeSheets
fields.fieldText:
Manual Sending of Time Sheets


Selecting Time Sheets for Employee {!LoopEmployeeCounter} of {!numSelectedEmployees}


Select the Time Sheets for {!Loop_Selected_Employees.Name} that you want to send for Approval.


{!Loop_Selected_Employees.Name}

fields.name: headerConfirmSelection
fields.fieldText: CONFIRM SELECTION

fields.name: displayConfirmSelectionInfo
fields.fieldText:
You've selected a total of {!numOfTimeSheetsSelected} Time Sheets to send for approval.


When you are done, click Submit Time Sheets for Approval and the employees in question, will be notified about each Time Sheet that they need to approve.

fields.name: textSubmissionComments

defaultValue.stringValue: Please review and approve your Time Sheet.

fields.helpText:
Not required

A comment entered here, will be presented to the employee, during their approval.


An example could be:

"As discussed in our call earlier, I am submitting your Time Sheet for Approval again."

subflows.name: Action_Flow_Calculate_Overdue_Time_Sheets
subflows.label: Action Flow: Calculate Overdue Time Sheets

subflows.name: Action_Flow_Submit_Time_Sheet_s_for_Approval_Flow
subflows.label: Action Flow: Submit Time Sheet(s) for Approval Flow
